item.title: Stolen Babies? Mother Loses Four Kids - ABC News
item.description: Stolen Babies? Immigrant Mom Loses 4 Kids; Mom Deported to #Mexico, 3-Month-Old Taken By Police: http://t.co/TCkhIp3y #phoenix @Nightline
item.content:encoded: Stolen Babies? Immigrant Mom Loses 4 Kids; Mom Deported to #Mexico, 3-Month-Old Taken By Police: http://t.co/TCkhIp3y #phoenix @Nightline The scars of childbirth were still healing on Amelia Reyes Jimenez's stomach in 2008 when police came to her Phoenix apartment and took her three-month-old daughter from her arms. Three and a half years later, Reyes Jimenez and her four children have become statistics in the U.S. crackdown on illegal immigration. Each year thousands of children of undocumented immigrants, like Amelia's kids, wind up in foster care when their parents are arrested for immigration violations. Some are even adopted by U.S. citizens while their parents are held in federal detention centers or deported back to their native countries. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: abcnews.go.com

item.title: Susan G. Komen Top Officials Resign As Backlash Gains Steam
item.description: Top Susan G. Komen officials resign amid backlash against Planned Parenthood decision http://t.co/2JCLX3mu
item.content:encoded: Top Susan G. Komen officials resign amid backlash against Planned Parenthood decision http://t.co/2JCLX3mu Dr. Kathy Plesser, a Manhattan radiologist on the medical advisory board of Susan G. Komen for the Cure's New York chapter, said she plans to resign from her position unless Komen reverses its decision to pull grant money from Planned Parenthood. "I’m a physician and my interest is women’s health, and I am disturbed by Komen’s decision because I am a very strong advocate for serving under-served women," Plesser told The Huffington Post. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.description: Video: Cassanova McKinzy spurned Clemson because it didn’t have a Chick-Fil-A: What's really important to a col... http://t.co/pheUdkEI
item.content:encoded: Video: Cassanova McKinzy spurned Clemson because it didn’t have a Chick-Fil-A: What's really important to a col... http://t.co/pheUdkEI Read 'Cassanova McKinzy spurned Clemson because he missed the Chick-Fil-A' from our blog Dr. Saturday on Yahoo! Sports. What's really important to a college football athlete when choosing the right school? Location, academics, the ability to start early? How about a school's proximity to Chick-Fil-A? That's apparently what swayed Birmingham, Ala., linebacker Cassanova McKinzy from Clemson to Auburn. … Continue reading → Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Exclusive: Hacked companies still not telling investors | Reuters
item.description: Exclusive: Hacked companies still not telling investors http://t.co/52Ehl4pp
item.content:encoded: Exclusive: Hacked companies still not telling investors http://t.co/52Ehl4pp SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - At least a half-dozen major U.S. companies whose computers have been infiltrated by cyber criminals or international spies have not admitted to the incidents despite new guidance Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: reuters.com
